page.title: 02Houses in Ferrybridge
page.content:
Our house is a terrace house. There are 8 houses in a row.Four people live in it.We own our house,dad bought it from the council.There are 7 rooms, kitchen,living room,3 bedrooms & a bathroom.Dad made the coalhouse into a bedroom.In our house we have double glazing and a patio.
We rent our house from the council.We have made it very nice.We have 8 rooms and there are 5 in our family.My favourite room is my bedroom.It has a new bed,a white wardrobe & some white & brown drawers.I have a cupboard for all my toys.I have a duvet with a pierrot picture on it.I also have pierrot wall paper,curtains & lamp shade.Pierrot is a girl who wears a black hat,white suit and shoes with black pom-poms.
